citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:50 pm on
07-Feb-20.
The licensee's daughter said that the licensee was out of town for most of the afternoon.

narrative:
